title: Proactive Renewal Outreach
description: An Account Manager reaches out to a customer 90 days before their annual subscription is set to renew.

tasks.description: Identify a customer whose contract expires in 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a report of upcoming renewals and selects a customer.

tasks.description: Review the customer's usage metrics and support ticket history to prepare for the call.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notes the customer has high adoption but has hit their API call limit several times.

tasks.description: Contact the customer to schedule a 'business review' meeting to discuss their renewal and the possibility of upgrading to a higher tier with more API calls.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules a meeting to discuss renewal and a potential upsell.
